entry.title: DevOpsDays DC
entry.content: A wrap-up of DevOpsDays DC recorded live at the end of the conference.

The Food Fight Show is brought to you by Bryan Berry and Nathen Harvey with help from other hosts and the awesome community of Chefs.

The show is sponsored, in part, by Chef.

Feedback, suggestions, and questions: info@foodfightshow.com or http://github.com/foodfight/showz.

entry.title: DevOpsDays - Silicon Valley
entry.content:
Show Date: June 21, 2013

Join this episode where we re-cap DevOpsDays Silicon Valley. We were lucky enough to have members from The Ship Show and DevOps Cafe.

  • Panel
  • Outline
  • Picks
  • Download Audio

Panel

  • Bryan Berry github, twitter, irc: bryanwb, blog: devopsanywhere
  • Nathen Harvey github, twitter, irc: nathenharvey, blog
  • John Vincent, aka Lusis twitter, github
  • J. Paul Reed twitter
  • Sascha Bates github, twitter
  • Patrick Debois github, twitter
  • Damon Edwards github, twitter
  • Robert Berger github, github

Outline

  • Operations Level Up - Presentation from Mandi Walls ([@lnxchk])(https://twitter.com/lnxchk)
  • Test-driven Infrastructure with Chef
  • How To Run a Post-mortem with Humans (Not Robots)
  • @mrhinkle and buildacloud.org
  • Is your Team Instrument Rated (or: Deploying 89.000 times a day)
  • DevOp with Me - Nathen's Lightning talk.
  • Leveling Up a New Engineer in a Devops Culture; Healthy Sustainability
  • DevOps and the CIA
  • Beer Pinapples and Bottlenecks
  • All the talks are now available!

entry.title: DevOpsDays with Mathias Meyer
entry.content:
Show Date: 18 January 2013

In this episode, Nathen and John sat down to talk with Mathias Meyer, aka @roidrage, to discuss his DevOpsDays NYC presentation, Failure is Always An Option, TravisCI, and more.

  • Download

Here's the video of the Boeing 787 Dreamliner Wing Break Test that was discussed in the episode.
